description:
Currently, IOVisor nova vif driver includes the version in its native APIs PATH. For instance:
/opt/pg/bin/0/ifc_ctl

Where /0/ is the version. The ideal case is to not include versioning numbers in the PATH
title: IOVisor driver should not use version number in PATH

comments.content:
Currently, IOVisor nova vif driver includes the version in its native APIs PATH. For instance:
/opt/pg/bin/0/ifc_ctl

Where /0/ is the version. The ideal case is to not include versioning numbers in the PATH
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~emagana

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/44972
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/44972
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/8fbd10ff3698fe9e805e84614ca9cad328ef2502
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 8fbd10ff3698fe9e805e84614ca9cad328ef2502
Author: Edgar Magana <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Sep 3 15:40:37 2013 -0700

    Remove versioning from IOVisor APIs PATH
    
    Fix bug #1220454
    
    In the first version of the IOVisor driver, versioning was included in the
    the PATH of the native IOVisor commands which was /opt/pg/bin/0/
    In the current version, versioning has been deleted from the PATH and
    now it should only include /opt/pg/bin/
    
    Change-Id: I2b88eb28593043843a9ac0afd5bff7c268db0f60
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
